text: Hi all, I have a blog in HubSpot where create a variety of posts separated by tags and would like to use the feature to post automatically on my social media only certain posts. I asked HubSpot and they don’t see a way to do that, but I was wondering if anyone ever came up with a work around this problem. Thank you.

could write a fairly simple script to regularly call the Blog API, then write logic such that IF post.meta.tag_ids includes your "featured" tag and post.publish_date is within the past 24 hours, use the necessary social APIs to create your posts. You could craft this as a serverless function that runs every hour, checking for new posts.

You could also look into Zapier if you're looking for a no/low-code solution.
I tried zapier but it doesn’t offer a way to filter the posts. I think using api is probably my best bet. Thank you.
